alert.note: Alert for Lenawee; Monroe (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 11 at 6:29PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Monroe and east central Lenawee Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 628 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Deerfield, or near Dundee, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Dundee around 635 PM EDT. Ida around 645 PM EDT. Temperance around 650 PM EDT. Monroe and Luna Pier around 705 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Samaria, Estral Beach, Toledo Beach, Erie, Woodland Beach, Stony Point, Ridgeway, La Salle, Bolles Harbor and Detroit Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
